mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_pet(pet_name, pet_age, pet_gender,mem_id,pet_kind) VALUES (#{pet_name},#{pet_age},#{pet_gender},#{mem_id},#{pet_kind})
mapper.select: select * from tb_pet where pet_seq = ( select pet_seq from tb_pet where mem_id = #{mem_id} and (pet_name=#{pet_name} and pet_age = #{pet_age})
select p.pet_name, p.pet_age, p.pet_gender,p.pet_kind, p.mem_id, p.pet_seq, f.file_seq, f.file_name, f.file_real_name from tb_pet p , tb_file f where p.pet_seq = f.pet_seq and p.mem_id = #{mem_id}
select p.pet_name, p.pet_age, p.pet_gender,p.pet_kind, p.mem_id, p.pet_seq, f.file_seq, f.file_name, f.file_real_name from tb_pet p , tb_file f where p.pet_seq = f.pet_seq and p.pet_seq = #{pet_seq}
